name: Inscribed Nail
text: [reaction] When you would search your deck or discard pile for any amount of cards, exhaust Inscribed Nail: Search 2 additional cards. Before resolving the search, either place a non-weakness card among the searched cards from your deck on the top of your discard pile, or vice versa. Shuffle your deck after the search resolves.

name: Command Essence
text:
Uses (3 charges).
[reaction] When an asset with health and/or sanity would enter your discard pile, exhaust Command Essence and spend 1 charge: Return that card to your hand instead.

name: Dimensional Inductor
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[action] Exhaust Dimensional Inductor: Discard the top card of the encounter deck.
[reaction] After you discard or shuffle an encounter card back into the encounter deck via a player effect, spend 1 secret: Search the top 9 cards of the encounter deck and discard each card with the same name as that encounter card. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Phase Reactance Gauge
text:
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
[reaction] After any amount of clues are moved to or placed on your location, exhaust Phase Reactance Gauge: You get +1 to each of your skills until the end of the round.

name: Gilded Coin
text:
Fast. Uses (O rewards).
[reaction] After you resolve an action and gained at least 1 resource during that action, exhaust Gilded Coin: Add 1 reward to Gilded Coin.
[action] Spend X rewards and shuffle Gilded Coin back into your deck: Play a card with cost X or less from your hand at no cost.

name: Midas Touch
text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Fight. You must use either [willpower] or [agility] instead of [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. You get +1 skill value for every 5 resources in your resource pool. If this attack defeats an enemy, you may gain a resource (2 resources instead if the defeated enemy had 3 or more total health).

name: Bloodstone Knife
text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [combat] for this attack for each token sealed on Bloodstone Knife. This attack deals +1 damage. [reaction] After you cancel or ignore a non-[auto_fail] token, exhaust Bloodstone Knife: Seal that token on Bloodstone Knife. Forced - At the end of the round, for each token sealed on Bloodstone Knife: Take 1 horror or release that token (choose one).

name: Phial of Living Blood
text:
Uses (O charges).
[reaction] After you reveal a [skull] token: Add 1 charge to Phial of Living Blood.
[fast] Spend 1 charge: Draw a card.
[fast] Spend 2 charges: Add a charge or secret to an asset you control.
[fast] Spend 2 charges: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location.
[fast] Spend 3 charges: Take an immediate action as if it were your turn.

name: Labranche Lamen
text:
[reaction] After you play, commit, or discard the last card in your hand, exhaust Labranche Lamen: Gain a resource.
[reaction] After you spend or lose the last resource in your resource pool, exhaust Labranche Lamen: Draw a card.

name: Invocation of Providence
text: [action] Exhaust Invocation of Providence: Heal 1 damage and 1 horror from among investigators and [[Ally]] assets at your location. If you have no resources in your resource pool, heal 1 additional damage. If you have no cards in your hand, heal 1 additional horror.
